segments.text: I hate to do this to you , Alice , but I ’ m going to have to ask you to put in some more overtime .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Does it have to be this afternoon , Mr . Fairbanks ? I ’ Ve already made plans .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I would have preferred to do it today , but if you ’ Ve already made plans , we can do it tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ d appreciate that , sir . How long do you think you ’ ll need me to stay ?
segments.speaker: S2
